text.div:
Group A Streptococcus Test

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11268-0 Streptococcus pyogenes [Presence] in Throat by Organism specific culture
    17656-0 Streptococcus pyogenes [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    17898-8 Bacteria identified in Throat by Aerobe culture
    18481-2 Streptococcus pyogenes Ag [Presence] in Throat
    31971-5 Streptococcus pyogenes Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    49610-9 Streptococcus pyogenes DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by Probe and target amplification method
    5036-9 Streptococcus pyogenes rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by DNA probe
    60489-2 Streptococcus pyogenes DNA [Presence] in Throat by Probe and target amplification method
    626-2 Bacteria identified in Throat by Culture
    6557-3 Streptococcus pyogenes Ag [Presence] in Throat by Immunofluorescence
    6558-1 Streptococcus pyogenes Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunoassay
    6559-9 Streptococcus pyogenes Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    68954-7 Streptococcus pyogenes rRNA [Presence] in Throat by DNA probe
    78012-2 Streptococcus pyogenes Ag [Presence] in Throat by Rapid immunoassay
